gurmukhi: eyk khI iqh ju`D mY jo koaU ibmuK krwie ] qw pY blu nih cil skY qum mwrY iPir Awie ]2278]
transliteration: Ek Kahitih Juddh Mai Jo Ko( i)  Bimoukh Karaae|| Taa Pai Bal(u) Nah(i) Chal(i) Sakai Toum Mdarai Phir(i) Aae||2278||
translation: “If anyone pushes him back in the fight and makes him inattentive then that power will come to kill you.”2278.

gurmukhi: AYsy sud`Cn ko jb hI kib sXwm BnY AYsy rudR bKwnXo ] so aun kwj kIXo auT kY Apny mn mY hrKwnXo ]
transliteration: Aise Sudachchhan Ko Jab Hikabi Syaam Bhanai Aise Rudra Bakhaanyo|| So Oun Kaaj Keeyo Outh Kai Apne Man Mai Harkhaanyo||
translation: When Shiva said this to Sudaksha, he was pleased; he did, as directed by Shiva;

gurmukhi: hom kIE iqn pwvk mY GiRq A`Cq kau jYsy bydn mwnXo ] rudR ko BwKby ko su kCU kib sXwm BnY jV Byd n jwnXo ]2279]
transliteration: Hom Keeo Tin Paavak Mai Ghrit Achchhat Kau Jaise Bedan Maanyo|| Rudra Ko Bhaakh Be Ko Su Kachhodh Kabi Syaam Bhanai Jad Bhed Na Jaanyo||2279||
translation: He performed the Havana by the use of fire, ghee and other ingredients according to Vedic injunctions; that fool did not understand the secret of Shiva’s words.2279.

gurmukhi: qau inksI iqh qy pRqmw iqh dyKq hI sB kau fru AwvY ] kaun blI pRgtXo jg mY ieh Dwvq A`gRj ko ThrwvY ]
transliteration: Tau Niksitih Te Pratmaa Tih Dekhat Hisabh Kau Dar(u) Aavai|| Kaoun Balipragtyo Jag Mai Eh Dhaavat Aggraj Ko Thahraavai||
translation: An idol came out of that homa, seeing which all got frightned; who is that mighty one in his world, who can stay against it?

gurmukhi: TwFI BeI kir lY kY gdw Aiq ros kY dwNq so dwNq bjwvY ] AYsy lKXo sBhUM ieh qy biRjnwiek jIvq jwn n pwvY ]2280]
transliteration: Thaadhibhaikar(i) Lai Kai Gadaa At(i) Ros Kai Daant So Daant Bajaavai|| Aise Lakhyo Sabh-hoon Eh Te Brijnaaik Jeevat Jaan Naa Paavai||2280||
translation: That idol, gnashing its teeth in fury, stood up, taking a huge mace and everyone thought that now Krishna will not go alive.2280.

gurmukhi: qb ids dÍwrvqI kI DweI ] Awiq iciq Apny kRoD bFweI ] sRI biRjnwQ ieqY sun pwXo ] eyk qyj koaU hm pY AwXo ]2281]
transliteration: Tab Dis Dvaarvatikidhaaee|| At(i) Chit(i) Apne Krodh Badhaaee|| Sribrijnaath Itai Soun Paayo|| Ek Tej Ko( i)  Ham Pai Aayo||2281||
translation: Then that idol, getting extremely enraged in its mind, started moving towards Dwarka; on the other side, Krishna came to know that some glorious entity was coming against him.2281.

gurmukhi: jo ieh ky Pun A`gRj AwvY ] so sB Bsm hoq hI jwvY ] jo ien sMg mwNf rn lrY ] so jm lok pXwno krY ]2282]
transliteration: Jo Eh Ke Phoun Aggraj Aavai|| So Sabh Bhasam Hot Hijaavai|| Jo In San Maand Ran Darai|| So Jam Lok Payaano Darai||2282||
translation: Whatsoever will confront it, will be reduced to ashes; whosoever will fight against it, he will go to the abode of Yama.2282.

gurmukhi: jo auh ky muK Awie gXo pRB so aunhU iCn mwih jrwXo ] XO suin bwq cVXo rQ pY hir qwhI kI swmuih ckR clwXo ]
transliteration: Jo Uh Ke Moukh Aae Gado Prabh So Ounhoo Chhin Maah(i) Jaraayo|| Yau Soun(i) Baat Chadyo Rath Pai Har(i) Taahikisaamuh(i) Chakra Chalaayo||
translation: “He, who comes before it, is burnt down in an instant.” Hearing these words, Krishna mounted on his chariot and discharged his discus towards it;

gurmukhi: ckR sudrSn ky iqn A`gRj qwhI ko paurK nYku bswXo ] AMq iKswie clI iPr kY kib sXwm khY soaU BUpiq GwXo ]2283]
transliteration: Chakra Sudrashan Ke Tin Aggraj Taahiko Paurakh Naik(u) Basaayo|| Ant Khisaae Chaliphirr Kai Kabi Syaam Kahai Sooo Bhoopat(i) Ghaayo||2283||
translation: Its strength seemed bedimmed before the discus (Sudarshan Chakra); getting extremely angry, it went back and it destroyed the king Sudaksha.2283.
